root: ^Ok guys, should we fight our way in, or think about it for a little longer?

Fight_volcano_entrance: ^Last one in is a rotten egg!
Think_about_it: ^OK, so what do you think we should do, Folkvar?
^Well, you know me. I do not yearn to fight. Therefore, I would rather be turned into a car and sneak passed the mercenaries.
^I concur. I would really appreciate avoiding any unnecessary conflict.
^I hear you guys, I really do. Here, let me cast the cat spell... Felifo-
